Interface LibraryService

All Known Implementing Classes:
LibraryServiceImpl
public interface LibraryService
Service interface for core library operations. Handles media item management, borrowing, returning, and loan tracking.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    MediaItem
    addMediaItem(MediaItem item)
    Adds a new media item to the library collection.
    Loan
    borrowItem(int userId, int itemId, LocalDate today)
    Processes a borrowing request for a user.
    boolean
    canUserBorrow(int userId, LocalDate today)
    Checks if a user is eligible to borrow items.
    List<Loan>
    getOverdueLoans(LocalDate today)
    Retrieves all overdue loans as of the specified date.
    List<Loan>
    getUserLoans(int userId)
    Retrieves all loans for a specific user.
    void
    returnItem(int loanId, LocalDate returnDate)
    Processes the return of a borrowed item.
    List<MediaItem>
    searchItems(String keyword)
    Searches for media items by keyword.

  • Method Details

    • addMediaItem

      MediaItem addMediaItem(MediaItem item)
      Adds a new media item to the library collection.
      Parameters:
      item - the media item to add
      Returns:
      the saved media item with generated ID

    • searchItems

      List<MediaItem> searchItems(String keyword)
      Searches for media items by keyword. Searches across title, author, ISBN, and publisher fields.
      Parameters:
      keyword - the search keyword
      Returns:
      list of matching media items

    • borrowItem

      Loan borrowItem(int userId, int itemId, LocalDate today)
      Processes a borrowing request for a user. Validates user eligibility, item availability, and creates a loan record.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user borrowing the item
      itemId - the ID of the media item to borrow
      today - the current date (used for loan and due date calculation)
      Returns:
      the created Loan object
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if user is not eligible or item is unavailable

    • returnItem

      void returnItem(int loanId, LocalDate returnDate)
      Processes the return of a borrowed item. Updates loan status and increments available copies.
      Parameters:
      loanId - the ID of the loan to return
      returnDate - the date the item is returned
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if loan not found or already returned

    • getOverdueLoans

      List<Loan> getOverdueLoans(LocalDate today)
      Retrieves all overdue loans as of the specified date.
      Parameters:
      today - the current date to check against due dates
      Returns:
      list of overdue loans

    • getUserLoans

      List<Loan> getUserLoans(int userId)
      Retrieves all loans for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      list of loans for the user

    • canUserBorrow

      boolean canUserBorrow(int userId, LocalDate today)
      Checks if a user is eligible to borrow items. User must have no overdue loans and no unpaid fines.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to check
      today - the current date
      Returns:
      true if user can borrow, false otherwise
